changeSet.author: jhipster
changeSet.script: db.T_USER.ensureIndex({"login" : 1}); db.T_USER.ensureIndex({"email" : 1}); db.T_USER.insert( { "_id" : "user-0", "login" : "system", "password" : "$2a$10$mE.qmcV0mFU5NcKh73TZx.z4ueI/.bDWbj0T1BYyqP481kGGarKLG", "first_name": "", "last_name": "System", "email": "", "activated": "true", "lang_key": "ru", "created_by": "system", "created_date": new Date(), "authorities": [{"_id": "ROLE_ADMIN"}, {"_id": "ROLE_USER"}] }); db.T_USER.insert( { "_id" : "user-1", "login" : "anonymousUser", "password" : "$2a$10$j8S5d7Sr7.8VTOYNviDPOeWX8KcYILUVJBsYV83Y5NtECayypx9lO", "first_name": "Anonymous", "last_name": "User", "email": "", "activated": "true", "lang_key": "ru", "created_by": "system", "created_date": new Date(), "authorities": [] }); db.T_USER.insert( { "_id" : "user-2", "login" : "admin", "password" : "$2a$10$gSAhZrxMllrbgj/kkK9UceBPpChGWJA7SYIb1Mqo.n5aNLq1/oRrC", "first_name": "", "last_name": "Administrator", "email": "", "activated": "true", "lang_key": "ru", "created_by": "system", "created_date": new Date(), "authorities": [{"_id": "ROLE_ADMIN"}] }); db.T_USER.insert( { "_id" : "user-3", "login" : "representative", "password" : "$2a$10$tjNuYnj7v6qM.NmzdDBaauhBosBLoi89kLhTF0qNPLKb3zBMHZxA.", "first_name": "", "last_name": "Representative", "email": "", "activated": "true", "lang_key": "ru", "created_by": "system", "created_date": new Date(), "authorities": [{"_id": "ROLE_REPRESENTATIVE"}] }); db.T_USER.insert( { "_id" : "user-4", "login" : "dealer", "password" : "$2a$10$YRKBx9JhIsPs5uMDL.J48.9l/e.JT/eHY47272S.AztrXQHUa7Zhq", "first_name": "", "last_name": "Dealer", "email": "", "activated": "true", "lang_key": "ru", "created_by": "system", "created_date": new Date(), "authorities": [{"_id": "ROLE_DEALER"}] });
